Baseview.name: ordersetprescription
Baseview.Namespace: { "listsettings.baseviewnamespace": [ { "_row_id": "aae8897c-614c-4370-ad2f-c0691bc55618", "_sequenceid": 30, "_contextkey": null, "_contextid": null, "_createdtimestamp": "2020-09-21T08:28:10.02473", "_createddate": "2020-09-21T08:28:10.02473", "_createdsource": "Synapse Studio", "_createdchannelid": null, "_createdmessageid": null, "_createdby": "Singh Manoj", "_recordstatus": 1, "_expirydate": null, "baseviewnamespaceid": "1ea2f183-7018-4118-aed3-d90ad6ff1548", "baseviewnamespace": "epma", "baseviewnamespacedescription": "to store baseview for epma" } ] }
Baseview.BaseviewManager:
{ "listsettings.baseviewmanager": [ { "_row_id": "2ce5aecd-efcf-4db0-ba6d-dd829e945110", "_sequenceid": 1475, "_contextkey": null, "_contextid": null, "_createdtimestamp": "2022-05-30T05:58:38.907234", "_createddate": "2022-05-30T05:58:38.907234", "_createdsource": "Synapse Studio", "_createdchannelid": null, "_createdmessageid": null, "_createdby": "Chawda Sachin", "_recordstatus": 1, "_expirydate": null, "_timezonename": null, "_timezoneoffset": 0, "baseview_id": "d85d617f-f564-45c3-ba96-da984d308751", "baseviewnamespaceid": "1ea2f183-7018-4118-aed3-d90ad6ff1548", "baseviewnamespace": "epma", "baseviewname": "ordersetprescription", "baseviewdescription": "Get the list of ordersets and the corresponding prescriptions", "baseviewsqlstatement": "SELECT
	epma_orderset_id as prescriptionorderset_id,
	prescriptionordersettype_id,
	ordersetname,
	CASE
		WHEN defined_criteria = 'Age in years' 
		THEN defined_criteria || ' min. ' || inclusive_value || ' years (incl.) max. ' || exclusive_value || ' years (excl.)'
		WHEN defined_criteria = 'Age in months' 
		THEN defined_criteria || ' min. ' || inclusive_value || ' months (incl.) max. ' || exclusive_value || ' months (excl.)'
		WHEN defined_criteria = 'Weight' 
		THEN defined_criteria || ' min. ' || inclusive_value || ' kg (incl.) max. ' || exclusive_value || ' kg (excl.)'
		WHEN defined_criteria = 'Body Surface' 
		THEN defined_criteria || ' min. ' || inclusive_value || ' sq.m (incl.) max. ' || exclusive_value || ' sq.m (excl.)'
	ELSE
		null
	END defined_criteria,
	person_id,
	owner,
 defined_criteria AS criteria ,inclusive_value ,exclusive_value ,groupsauthorizedtoview
FROM 
	entitystorematerialised.local_epma_orderset
ORDER BY
 ordersetname;", "ismaterialised": false } ] }

Baseview.name: prescriptiondetail
Baseview.Namespace: { "listsettings.baseviewnamespace": [ { "_row_id": "aae8897c-614c-4370-ad2f-c0691bc55618", "_sequenceid": 30, "_contextkey": null, "_contextid": null, "_createdtimestamp": "2020-09-21T08:28:10.02473", "_createddate": "2020-09-21T08:28:10.02473", "_createdsource": "Synapse Studio", "_createdchannelid": null, "_createdmessageid": null, "_createdby": "Singh Manoj", "_recordstatus": 1, "_expirydate": null, "baseviewnamespaceid": "1ea2f183-7018-4118-aed3-d90ad6ff1548", "baseviewnamespace": "epma", "baseviewnamespacedescription": "to store baseview for epma" } ] }
Baseview.BaseviewManager:
{ "listsettings.baseviewmanager": [ { "_row_id": "92b35e2c-db51-4e30-9d35-1cc22069d0aa", "_sequenceid": 1546, "_contextkey": null, "_contextid": null, "_createdtimestamp": "2022-06-22T09:47:38.437836", "_createddate": "2022-06-22T09:47:38.437836", "_createdsource": "Synapse Studio", "_createdchannelid": null, "_createdmessageid": null, "_createdby": "kishore rahul", "_recordstatus": 1, "_expirydate": null, "_timezonename": null, "_timezoneoffset": 0, "baseview_id": "83b76c9b-3691-4d0b-9376-950c1fe5fcea", "baseviewnamespaceid": "1ea2f183-7018-4118-aed3-d90ad6ff1548", "baseviewnamespace": "epma", "baseviewname": "prescriptiondetail", "baseviewdescription": "to get the prescription detail", "baseviewsqlstatement": "select prescription_id, prescriptioncontext_id, indication, otherindications, "comments", heparin, heparinunit, prescriptionadditionalconditions_id, reminderdays, remindernotes, titration, titrationtype, targetinr, targetsaturation, oxygendevices_id, orderformtype, isinfusion, infusiontype_id, ismedicinalgas, prescriptionsource_id, hasbeenmodified, reasonforediting, lastmodifiedby, prescriptionstatus_id, epma_prescriptionevent_id, reasonforstopping, reasonforsuspending, allowsubstitution, substitutioncomments, person_id, encounter_id, createdon, createdby, lastmodifiedon, linkedinfusionid, titrationtargetmin, titrationtargetmax, titrationtargetunits, titrationtypecode, oxygenadditionalinfo, correlationid, dispensingfrom, ismodifiedrelease, isgastroresistant, moatoip, prescriptionsources, otherprescriptionsource, startdatetime, printingrequired,__posology,
__medications,__routes from 
(
select		
 prescription_id, prescriptioncontext_id, indication, otherindications, "comments", heparin, heparinunit, prescriptionadditionalconditions_id, reminderdays, remindernotes, titration, titrationtype, targetinr, targetsaturation, oxygendevices_id, orderformtype, isinfusion, infusiontype_id, ismedicinalgas, prescriptionsource_id, hasbeenmodified, reasonforediting, lastmodifiedby, prescriptionstatus_id, epma_prescriptionevent_id, reasonforstopping, reasonforsuspending, allowsubstitution, substitutioncomments, person_id, encounter_id, createdon, createdby, lastmodifiedon, linkedinfusionid, titrationtargetmin, titrationtargetmax, titrationtargetunits, titrationtypecode, oxygenadditionalinfo, correlationid, dispensingfrom, ismodifiedrelease, isgastroresistant, moatoip, prescriptionsources, otherprescriptionsource,startdatetime, printingrequired,
 (
 select
 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(postop))), '[]') 
 from
 (
 select
 posology_id, prescription_id, prescriptionstartdate, prescriptionenddate, frequency, frequencysize, infusiontypeid, infusionrate, infusionduration, daysofweek, dosingdaysfrequency, dosingdaysfrequencysize, prescriptionduration, prescriptiodurationsize, repeatlastday, repeatprotocoltimes, doseperkg, dosepersa, antimicrobialstartdate, doctorsorder, prn, isadditionaladministration, person_id, encounter_id, TRIM(classification) as classification, dosetype, repeatlastdayuntil, totalinfusionvolume, correlationid, totalquantity, infusionrateunits, maxnumofdosesperday, titration, titrationtype, totalquantitytext, titrationtargetmin, titrationtargetmax, titrationtargetunits, titrationtypecode,iscurrent, prnmaxdose,
 (
 select
 			 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(postop))), '[]') 
			 from
			 (
			 select
			 dose_id, prescription_id, posology_id, dosestartdatetime, doseenddatatime, strengthneumerator, strengthdenominator, strengthneumeratorunit, strengthdenominatorunit, dosesize, doseunit, dosemeasure, descriptivedose, infusionrate, infusionduration, titration, titrateddoseconfirmedon, titrateddoseconfirmedby, lastmodifiedby, isadditionaladministration, person_id, encounter_id, dosetype, continuityid, isbolus, additionaladministrationcomment, correlationid, strengthneumeratorrangemax, strengthdenominatorrangemax, dosesizerangemax, dosestrength, dosestrengthunits , dosestrengthrangemax 
			 from
			 entitystorematerialised.core_dose cd 
			 where
			 cd.posology_id = cp2.posology_id 
			 )
			 postop
 ) __dose
 from
 entitystorematerialised.core_posology cp2 
 where
 cp2.prescription_id = cp.prescription_id 
 )
 postop
 )
 __posology,
 (
 select
 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(rr))), '[]') 
 from
 (
 select
 prescriptionroutes_id, routecode, route, routetype, isunlicensed, isdefault, prescription_id, medication_id, correlationid
 from
 entitystorematerialised.core_prescriptionroutes cp3 
 where
 cp3.prescription_id = cp.prescription_id 
 )
 rr 
 )
 __routes,
 (
 select
 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(mm))), '[]') 
 from
 (
 select
 medication_id, prescription_id, "name", genericname, medicationtype, displayname, form, formcode, strengthneumerator, strengthdenominator,
					 strengthneumeratorunit, strengthdenominatorunit, doseformunits, doseformsize, doseformunitofmeasure, bnf, defineddailydose, doseform, doseperweight,
					 doseperweightunit, roundingfactor, actgroupcode, actgroupname, orderformtype, maxdoseperdayunit, maxdoseperday, maxdoseperweek, maxdoseperweekunit,
					 titrationtype, producttype, isformulary, isblacktriangle, iscontrolled, iscritical, markedmodifier, modifiedreleasehrs, reviewreminderdays, isprimary,
					 person_id, encounter_id, TRIM(classification) as classification, isclinicaltrial, isexpensive, isbloodproduct,isunlicenced, ishighalert, customgroup, correlationid, isantimicrobial, 
 (
			 select
			 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(mmin))), '[]') 
			 from
			 (
			 select
			 medicationingredients_id, medication_id, "name", displayname, strengthneumerator, strengthdenominator, strengthneumeratorunit, strengthdenominatorunit, isprimaryingredient, correlationid
							 from
			 entitystorematerialised.core_medicationingredients cm2 
			 where
			 cm2.medication_id = cm.medication_id 
			 )
			 mmin
			 )
			 __ingredients,
			 (
			 select
			 coalesce(array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(cc))), '[]') 
			 from
			 (
			 select
			 correlationid, medicationcodes_id,medication_id, code, terminology
								from
			 	entitystorematerialised.core_medicationcodes cm3 
			 where
			 	cm3.medication_id = cm.medication_id 
			 )
			 cc
			 )
			 __codes
 from
 entitystorematerialised.core_medication cm 
 where
 cm.prescription_id = cp.prescription_id 
 )
 mm 
 )
 __medications
 from
 entitystorematerialised.core_prescription cp 
) t ", "ismaterialised": false } ] }
